hero.title: Discover Kenya
hero.subtitle: Explore the beauty and diversity of Kenya with authentic local experiences
hero.searchPlaceholder: Where do you want to go in Kenya?

featuredDestinations.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
featuredDestinations.description: World-famous for the Great Migration and Big Five wildlife viewing

featuredDestinations.name: Diani Beach
featuredDestinations.description: Pristine white sand beaches with crystal clear waters and water sports

featuredDestinations.name: Amboseli National Park
featuredDestinations.description: Spectacular views of Mount Kilimanjaro and large elephant herds

featuredDestinations.name: Lamu Old Town
featuredDestinations.description: Historic Swahili architecture and traditional dhow sailing

featuredDestinations.name: Mount Kenya
featuredDestinations.description: Africa's second highest peak with diverse ecosystems and trekking routes

featuredDestinations.name: Lake Nakuru National Park
featuredDestinations.description: Famous for flamingos, rhinos, and diverse bird species

featuredDestinations.name: Kenya's Wildlife
featuredDestinations.description: Home to the "Big Five" and countless other species.

featuredDestinations.name: Nairobi City
featuredDestinations.description: The vibrant capital with a unique blend of urban and natural attractions.

featuredDestinations.name: Karura Forest
featuredDestinations.description: An urban forest in Nairobi with waterfalls, caves, and cycling trails.

featuredDestinations.name: Unique Tree Houses
featuredDestinations.description: Experience Kenya from a unique perspective in a luxury tree house.

featuredDestinations.name: Kenyan Culinary Journey
featuredDestinations.description: Explore the rich flavors of traditional Kenyan food.

featuredDestinations.name: Classic Safari Experience
featuredDestinations.description: Embark on an adventure in a traditional open-roof safari vehicle.

featuredDestinations.name: Maasai Market
featuredDestinations.description: Vibrant open-air market with traditional crafts and souvenirs.

featuredDestinations.name: Karen Blixen Museum
featuredDestinations.description: Former home of the "Out of Africa" author, offering a glimpse into colonial history.

featuredDestinations.name: Scenic Hiking Trails
featuredDestinations.description: Explore Kenya's diverse landscapes on foot, from mountains to valleys.

featuredDestinations.name: Chyulu Hills National Park
featuredDestinations.description: Explore the rolling green hills and volcanic landscapes of this lesser-known park.

featuredDestinations.name: Fort Jesus, Mombasa
featuredDestinations.description: Step back in time at this historic Portuguese fort and UNESCO World Heritage Site.

featuredDestinations.name: Hell's Gate National Park
featuredDestinations.description: Walk among towering cliffs and explore dramatic gorges on foot in this unique park.

featuredDestinations.name: Traditional Kenyan Cultural Experience
featuredDestinations.description: Immerse yourself in authentic Kenyan traditions, dance, music, and storytelling.

categories.title: Wildlife Safari
categories.description: Experience the Big Five and witness the Great Migration in world-renowned national parks

categories.title: Coastal Adventures
categories.description: Relax on pristine beaches, enjoy water sports, and explore marine national parks

categories.title: Mountain Trekking
categories.description: Conquer peaks like Mount Kenya and explore scenic highland landscapes

categories.title: Cultural Heritage
categories.description: Immerse yourself in traditional Maasai culture and Swahili coastal heritage

categories.title: Culinary Tours
categories.description: Taste authentic Kenyan cuisine and learn traditional cooking methods

categories.title: Urban Exploration
categories.description: Discover vibrant cities like Nairobi and Mombasa with their modern attractions

about.title: About Peer Trips
about.description: A premier travel platform connecting adventurers with authentic local experiences and travel buddies.
